text: Ivan Antonio Izquierdo (16 September 1937 â€“ 9 February 2021) was an Argentine- Brazilian scientist. Izquierdo taught at National University of Cordoba (UNC), in Argentina. For more than 20 years, he worked in the "Center of Memory" of the Biochemistry Department of the Health Basic Sciences Institute (ICBS) at the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul (UFRGS). He died of pneumonia on 9 February 2021, at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Scientists from Buenos Aires Category:Brazilian scientists
title: Ivan Izquierdo
